footer.copyright: Â© {{year}} K6 Commander. All rights reserved.

tour.step1: Enter the full URL of the application or endpoint you want to test here.
tour.step2: Select which test suites you want to run. You can run one or multiple at the same time.
tour.step3: Choose a load test profile. 'Baseline' is great for a quick check, or choose 'Custom' for full control.
tour.step4: Click here to start the test! The results will appear in a new view.

form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure and launch a new test run against your application.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the page or API endpoint to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select the test suites to include in this run.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to analyze performance and reliability.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Analyze Performance, SEO, and Accessibility scores.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Perform a deep analysis of on-page SEO factors.
form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Define the amount of load to generate during the test.
form.customProfileDescription: Fine-tune the load test parameters. Define either VUs/duration OR a list of stages.
form.stagesDescription: Define a sequence of load stages over time.

error.atLeastOne: At least one test suite must be selected.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Your test history and recent URLs have been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test run has started. You will be taken to the results page shortly.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Local History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: To improve performance, it's recommended to clear your test history before starting a new run. Would you like to clear it?

running.title: Test is Running...
running.description: Please do not navigate away from this page. You can monitor the live load test on Grafana.

summary.title: Test Summary
summary.description: The results for your test run on {{url}}
summary.noK6Data: No load test data available for this run.
summary.noSeoData: No SEO analysis data available for this run.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review, re-run, or export your previous test results.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a new test from the main page to get started.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This will permanently delete your entire test history and recent URLs. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Delete this test run?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove this item from your history.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved as a JSON file.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Your test history has been successfully imported.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not read the selected file.
toast.importInvalidFormat: The selected file is not a valid history export.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: Your test history has been successfully cleared.

about.title: A Modern Testing Platform for Developers
about.description: K6 Commander is a lightweight, local-first, authorized load-testing platform. It allows you to configure, run, and analyze load tests, Lighthouse audits, and basic SEO checks directly from a sleek web UI.
about.localFirstDescription: All your data stays on your machine. We never see your test configurations or results.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Combine the power of k6, Lighthouse, and AI analysis in one cohesive interface.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Go beyond simple API calls and understand how your system performs under pressure.
about.k6HowItWorks: When you run a load test, the application spins up a dedicated k6 Docker container, configured with the exact parameters you set.
about.k6HowItWorks2: Metrics are streamed in real-time to a local InfluxDB instance and visualized in a pre-configured Grafana dashboard, giving you instant insights.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Get objective, actionable insights into your site's performance, accessibility, and SEO.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The backend spawns a headless Chrome instance and runs a Lighthouse audit using the official lighthouse NPM package.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: It then saves the full HTML report, which you can view directly, and parses the JSON output to display the score summary.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Leverage Genkit and the Gemini model to perform a deep analysis of your on-page SEO.
about.seoHowItWorks: The application fetches your URL's raw HTML and sends it to a Genkit flow running on the backend.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI analyzes critical SEO elements like title tags, meta descriptions, and canonicals, providing actionable recommendations for any issues it finds.
about.stackDescription: K6 Commander is built with modern, powerful, and open-source technologies.
about.involvedDescription: This is an open-source project. Contributions, bug reports, and feature requests are always welcome.

apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see the response here.
